info.title: Hedera Status API
info.description: API for retrieving the status, components, incidents, and scheduled maintenances of the Hedera network.

get.summary: Retrieve the current status of the Hedera network
get.description: Fetches the overall status and health indicators of the Hedera network.

200.description: A JSON object containing the current status and page information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the status page.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the last update.

indicator.description: Indicator of the current status (e.g., major, minor).

get.summary: Retrieve a summary of the status page.
get.description: Get a summary of the status page, including a status indicator, component statuses, unresolved incidents, and any upcoming or in-progress scheduled maintenances.

200.description: A JSON object containing the summary of the status page.

id.description: Unique identifier for the status page.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the last update.

indicator.description: Indicator of the current status (e.g., major, minor).

created_at.description: Timestamp when the component was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the last update to the component.

group.description: Indicates if the component is a group.

group_id.description: Identifier of the group this component belongs to.

only_show_if_degraded.description: Whether to show the component only if it's degraded.

position.description: Position of the component in the list.

showcase.description: Indicates if the component is showcased.

page_id.description: Identifier of the page this component belongs to.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the incident was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the last update to the incident.

resolved_at.description: Timestamp when the incident was resolved.

monitoring_at.description: Timestamp when monitoring of the incident

created_at.description: Timestamp when the component was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the last update to the component.

group.description: Indicates if the component is a group.

group_id.description: Identifier of the group this component belongs to.

only_show_if_degraded.description: Whether to show the component only if it's degraded.

position.description: Position of the component in the list.

showcase.description: Indicates if the component is showcased.

page_id.description: Identifier of the page this component belongs to.

get.description: Provides detailed information about each component of the Hedera network.

200.description: A JSON object containing the status of all components.

id.description: Unique identifier for the status page.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the last update.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the component was created.

only_show_if_degraded.description: Whether to show the component only if it's degraded.

position.description: Position of the component in the list.

showcase.description: Indicates if the component is showcased.

page_id.description: Identifier of the page this component belongs to.

get.description: Fetches a list of all incidents, both resolved and unresolved, affecting the Hedera network.

200.description: A JSON object containing all incidents.

id.description: Unique identifier for the status page.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the last update.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the incident was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the last update to the incident.

resolved_at.description: Timestamp when the incident was resolved.

monitoring_at.description: Timestamp when monitoring of the incident

page_id.description: Identifier of the page this component belongs to.
